explains: adj. 未解决的；无决断力的；不果断的

sentences.en: Unresolved or unacknowledged fears can trigger sleepwalking.
sentences.cn: 未解决或未被注意的恐惧感会引发梦游。

sentences.en: Sickness will often then be a result of unresolved inner conflicts which in time show up in the body.
sentences.cn: 疾病常常是未解决的内在冲突的结果，这些冲突最终会在体内显现出来。
这宗谋杀案还没有侦破。
